root: ^I am Eldrath, the guardian of this magic place.
^I know you are the one who can save the world from its problems.
^Here on the right you will find an enchanted chest.
^It will tell you some enigmas to solve in order to save the world.
^Pay attention: you can make only up to 3 mistakes...
^...and each time you solve one, you will have to come back there for the next one.
